original_text: And there went a proclamation throughout the host about the going down of the sun, saying, Every man to his city, and every man to his own country.
korean_text: 해가 질 녘에 진중에서 외치는 소리가 있어 이르되 각기 성읍으로 또는 각기 본향으로 가라 하더라

sentences.original_text: And there went a proclamation throughout the host
about the going down of the sun
saying, Every man to his city
and every man to his own country
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 사람은 자기 나라로 가라
